title: Per Capita Personal Consumption Expenditures: Services: Transportation Services for Rocky Mountain BEA Region
notes:
Personal consumption expenditures of a given area divided by the resident population of the area.

Spending on motor vehicle services and public transportation. Motor vehicle services consist of motor vehicle maintenance and repair and other motor vehicle services. Public transportation consists of ground transportation, air transportation, and water transportation.For more information about this release go to http://www.bea.gov/newsreleases/regional/pce/pce_newsrelease.htm.
